instructions.reason_for_call: You want to return everything but a tablet in a recently delivered order. There is an E-Reader in the order that you want to return.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Gonzalez and your zip code is 91455.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You want to know how much money you can get back.

nl_assertions: Agent should communicate the refund to user.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I recently received an order and I want to return everything except for a tablet. There is also an E-Reader in the order that I want to return. Could you please tell me how much money I can get back for the items I want to return?

message.content: Hi! I recently received an order and I want to return everything except for a tablet. There is also an E-Reader in the order that I want to return. Could you please tell me how much money I can get back for the items I want to return?

messages.content:
I can help with that. First I need to authenticate you by locating your user id. Please provide either:

- your email address (preferred), or  
- your first name, last name, and ZIP code.

Also please provide the order ID (for example "#W0000000") so I can look up the order and calculate the refund for all items except the tablet (including the E-Reader). Finally, tell me how you want the refund to be issued — to the original payment method or to an existing gift card (if gift card, please give the gift card id).
